languages.text: "Прекрасное место для размышлений". {n}Взгляд приблизившегося к вам мужчины устремлен вниз — в глубины корабельного храма, раскинувшего свои своды на нижней палубе.{/n} "Отсюда открывается лучший вид на кафедральный собор. Завораживает, не правда ли? Свидетельство величия {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}, нашедшее безукоризненное воплощение".

traits.locale_text: "Прекрасное место для размышлений". {n}Взгляд приблизившегося к вам мужчины устремлен вниз — в глубины корабельного храма, раскинувшего свои своды на нижней палубе.{/n} "Отсюда открывается лучший вид на кафедральный собор. Завораживает, не правда ли? Свидетельство величия {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}, нашедшее безукоризненное воплощение".

languages.text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."
languages.original_text: "Прекрасное место для размышлений". {n}Взгляд приблизившегося к вам мужчины устремлен вниз — в глубины корабельного храма, раскинувшего свои своды на нижней палубе.{/n} "Отсюда открывается лучший вид на кафедральный собор. Завораживает, не правда ли? Свидетельство величия {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}, нашедшее безукоризненное воплощение".

traits.locale_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks of the ship.{/n} "It has the best view of the vessel's cathedral. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

"An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks of the ship.{/n} "It has the best view of the vessel's cathedral. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

"An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

languages.text: “这里实在是再适合沉思不过了。”{n}一个男人一边朝你走来，一边看着远方，凝视着下层甲板巨型神庙深处。{/n}“从这里可以看到大教堂最美妙的景观。这真是太美妙了，您说呢？这是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}崇高地位无懈可击的体现。”
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: “这里实在是再适合沉思不过了。”{n}一个男人一边朝你走来，一边看着远方，凝视着下层甲板巨型神庙深处。{/n}“从这里可以看到大教堂最美妙的景观。这真是太美妙了，您说呢？这是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}崇高地位无懈可击的体现。”

languages.text: «Un lugar excelente para la contemplación». {n}El hombre que se ha acercado a ti observa las profundidades del inmenso templo de una de las cubiertas inferiores.{/n} «Esta es la mejor vista de la catedral. Es espectacular, ¿no le parece? Una manifestación impecable de la majestuosidad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}».
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: «Un lugar excelente para la contemplación». {n}El hombre que se ha acercado a ti observa las profundidades del inmenso templo de una de las cubiertas inferiores.{/n} «Esta es la mejor vista de la catedral. Es espectacular, ¿no le parece? Una manifestación impecable de la majestuosidad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}».

languages.text: 「思索にはうってつけの場所です」{n}あなたに近づいてきた男は、下層デッキの一つで広大な神殿の深さを見つめている。{/n}「ここから大聖堂の最高の景色を眺めることができます。魅惑的だと思いませんか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の崇高さを何よりも良く表しています」
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: 「思索にはうってつけの場所です」 {n}あなたに近づいてきた男は、下層デッキの一つで広大な神殿の深さを見つめています。{/n}「ここから大聖堂の最高の景色を眺めることができます。魅惑的だと思いませんか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の崇高さを何よりも良く表しています」
「思索にはうってつけの場所です」{n}あなたに近づいてきた男は、下層デッキの一つで広大な神殿の深さを見つめている。{/n}「ここから大聖堂の最高の景色を眺めることができます。魅惑的だと思いませんか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の崇高さを何よりも良く表しています」

languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the God-Emperor's sublimity."

languages.text: « Un endroit idéal pour s'abîmer dans la contemplation. » {n}L'homme qui s'est approché de vous observe les profondeurs du vaste temple érigé sur l'un des ponts inférieurs.{/n} « Il offre l'une des meilleures vues sur la cathédrale. Fascinant, n'est-ce pas ? Une manifestation parfaite de la magnificence de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: « Un endroit idéal pour s'abîmer dans la contemplation. » {n}L'homme qui s'est approché de vous observe les profondeurs du vaste temple érigé sur l'un des ponts inférieurs.{/n} « Il offre l'une des meilleures vues sur la cathédrale. Fascinant, n'est-ce pas ? Une manifestation parfaite de la magnificence de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}. »

languages.text: "Ein ausgezeichneter Ort zur inneren Einkehr." {n}Der Mann, der an dich herangetreten ist, blickt in die Tiefen des großen Tempels auf einem der unteren Decks.{/n} "Man hat von hier aus den besten Blick auf die Kathedrale. Faszinierend, findet Ihr nicht? Eine makellose Manifestation der Erhabenheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g}."
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: "Ein ausgezeichneter Ort zur inneren Einkehr." {n}Der Mann, der an dich herangetreten ist, blickt in die Tiefen des großen Tempels auf einem der unteren Decks.{/n} "Man hat von hier aus den besten Blick auf die Kathedrale. Faszinierend, findet Ihr nicht? Eine makellose Manifestation der Erhabenheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g}."

languages.text: "Düşüncelere dalmak için harika bir yer." {n}Yanına yanaşan adam alt güvertelerden birindeki engin tapınağın derinliklerine doğru bakıyor.{/n} "Katedral en iyi buradan görülüyor. Büyüleyici, değil mi? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} yüceliğinin kusursuz bir tezahürü."
languages.original_text: "An excellent place for contemplation." {n}The man who has approached you is gazing down into the depths of the vast temple on one of the lower decks.{/n} "One has the best view of the cathedral from here. Mesmerising, wouldn't you say? An impeccable manifestation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s sublimity."

traits.locale_text: "Düşüncelere dalmak için harika bir yer." {n}Yanına yanaşan adam alt güvertelerden birindeki engin tapınağın derinliklerine doğru bakıyor.{/n} "Katedral en iyi buradan görülüyor. Büyüleyici, değil mi? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'un yüceliğinin kusursuz bir tezahürü."
